title: @Riot: The Ocrean Week Fizz icon isn't in the store
body:
Here's some screenshots of my client, with the "Show All" button checked showing that I didn't buy it already.

I'm a sad fish :(

http://puu.sh/f9KEV.jpg
http://puu.sh/f9KOL.jpg

replies.body: The icon is now in the store for 1ip. Thanks to all the community members that helped us reach this milestone!
Thanks for the report Tundra Fizz Oce, we are working on this now.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Cochese,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cIeFMVjL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T21:01:59.383+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report Tundra Fizz Oce, we are working on this now.

Awesome; thanks for the update! :D
